extName.message: Yɛ mmuae ka fael a aka ho

extDescription.message: Ɛde fael a na ɛka email no ho no bɛka mmuae no ho otomatik.

composeTitle.message: Yɛ mmuae ka fael a aka ho

optionsTitle.message: Yɛ mmuae ka fael a aka ho — Nhyehyɛe

confirmTitle.message: Si pi fael a aka ho

uiHeader.message: Yɛ mmuae ka fael a aka ho

uiNoOptions.message: Seisei de, nhyehyɛe biara nni hɔ a wobɛtumi asesa.

uiSupport.message: Wopɛ saa add-on yi? Mesrɛ wo, boa me akatua ketewa bi:

uiRateATNText.message: Mesrɛ, yɛ no rate wɔ ATN so

uiDonateSnoozed.message: Meda wo ase! Akyɛdeɛ asrɛ no ahintaw ma da 90.

uiDonateRestored.message: Akyɛdeɛ asrɛ no ada adi bio.

uiGithubText.message: Sɛ wowɔ mfomso anaa nsɛmmisa foforo a, mesrɛ, kɔ me

iconAlt.message: Yɛ mmuae ka fael a aka ho Ikon

uiBlacklistHeader.message: Liste fɛɛl-din a wɔmmfa ho (glob patterns)

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Fɛɛl a wɔn din bɛtɔ ahorow yi biara mu no, wɔrenka ho otomatik da. Nhyehyɛe baako wɔ lain biara. Mfatoho: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Bɔ kɔkɔ sɛ nkaho no agyigye efisɛ ɛwɔ blacklist mu

uiDebugHelp.message: Ɛkyerɛw detal log ahorow kɔ Thunderbird developer console mu. Yi fi so bio sɛ w'awie asɛe-ho hwehwɛ no.

uiConfirmLabel.message: Bisa ansa na wɔde nkaho bɛka ho

uiConfirmHelp.message: Nkɔmmɔketewa asipii bɛda adi bere pɛ a na nkaho no bɛka ho ampa. Keyboard: Y or J = Aane; N or Esc = Dabi.

warnBlacklistTitle.message: Wɔayi efiri mu efisɛ ɛwɔ blacklist mu

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Fɛɛl a edidi so yi renka ho otomatik:
